api_list.api_description: Query interface for searching arXiv articles.

optional_parameters.name: search_query
optional_parameters.description: Search terms used for the query.

optional_parameters.name: id_list
optional_parameters.description: List of arXiv article IDs for the query.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Index of the first returned result.

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

api_list.api_description: Get facts for multiple numbers in one request.

optional_parameters.name: numbers
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated list of numbers or number ranges.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Return the facts in JSON format.

query: I have these arXiv paper IDs: '2103.00020', '2103.00021'. Can you provide summaries of these papers? Additionally, can you provide interesting facts about the numbers 7, 42, and 100?
